```{r}
table(baseline$sexe)
```


```{r}
j=0
for(j in 1:(dim(baseline)[1])){
  if(baseline$sexe[j] == 0)
    baseline$sexe[j] = 'F'
  else if (baseline$sexe[j] == 1)
    baseline$sexe[j] = 'H'
}
```

```{r}
table(baseline$sexe)
```

```{r}
round(  prop.table(   table(baseline$sexe)   )*100  ,1)
```

```{r}
baseline$sexe = as.factor(baseline$sexe)
str(baseline$sexe)
```
